hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Bara:(And Al-Bara was not a liar) Whenever we offered prayer with the Prophet (ﷺ) and he raised his head from the bowing, we used to remain standing till we saw him prostrating

chapter.ara-name: باب رَفْعِ الْبَصَرِ إِلَى الإِمَامِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: To cast a look at the Imam during As-Salat (the prayer)
